Table2Excel - Effortlessly Extract and Export Web Tables

Table2Excel is a browser plugin that lets you easily analyze, extract and export table data from web pages straight into Excel files. It works seamlessly across all major browsers.

Key Features:

One-click extraction of all tables from any web page
Smart data analysis - statistics and visualizations
Flexible export options - download as Excel, CSV or HTML
Customize table selection and data range
Adapts tables for easy use in Excel
Handles complex table structures and layouts
Useful for data analysis, research, reporting and more
Table2Excel saves you hours of manually copying and pasting web tables. It gives you powerful tools to unlock the data hidden in web pages for your spreadsheet needs. Stop struggling with web table data - let Table2Excel do the hard work for you!
